definition[0]: a small block of ice used to make drinks cold
definition[1]: (1969-) a US rapper, actor, and film producer who was born in Los Angeles, California. His albums include Death Certificate (1991), The Predator (1992), and Raw Footage (2008). He has acted in films such as Boyz n the Hood (1991), Barbershop (2002), and Are We There Yet? (2005). His real name is Oâ€™Shea Jackson.
